name: ML in Archaeology
description: A R&D project to apply CV aimed at standardizing sherd images and utilizing deep learning to group similar sherds to facilitate archaeologists' field work.

name: Explore Worldly
description: This is an ongoing fullstack project for the explorer to record the footsteps around the world. It utilizes the power of Mapbox Maps on React.

name: HKU SearchU
description: An React Native App that allows HKUers to search and report news and lost items based on locations in the university using a map.

name: This Website
description: The website you are now looking at! Built with React.
